name: Lawn and Order
description:
You play the role of a lazy groundskeeper working at a top football stadium. You've slept in, and missed the start of the match! Rush to work, jump on your ride-on mower, and start cutting the grass whilst the game is in progress! Don't run over any of the players though, or you'll leave a nasty stain. Cut as much of the grass as you can before the match finishes, and go for the high score!

This game was made as a result of the Guildford Game Jammers Awesome Sports Jam of 2016. To join a Guildford game jam, visit this page: https://www.facebook.com/groups/486374098214833/
